resources.string: This application keeps track of bluetooth connection and disconnection events on the device. \nIf location access is granted it will also show where the event took place, which is handy if you are trying to find a lost device.

Unless you grant location permission, you will not be able to display a map showing where an event took place. \nOn Android 10 (Q) devices, you need to allow location access when the app is in the background for it the tracking to work properly.
